## üìö Documentation Issue

### Type of Documentation Issue

- [ ] Missing documentation
- [ ] Incorrect/outdated information
- [ ] Unclear explanation
- [ ] Broken links
- [ ] Code example doesn't work
- [ ] Typo/grammar
- [ ] Other: ___

### Location

**Which document(s) are affected?**

- File(s): [e.g., README.md, docs/USAGE_GUIDE.md]
- Section(s): [e.g., "Installation", "Training Pipeline"]
- Line(s): [if applicable]

### Current State

**What is currently documented?**

```markdown
Current text/code example that has issues
```

Or describe what's currently there.

### Issue Description

**What is the problem?**

A clear description of what's wrong or missing.

### Proposed Improvement

**What should the documentation say instead?**

```markdown
Suggested improved text/code example
```

Or describe what should be added/changed.

### Why This Matters

**Who would benefit from this improvement?**

- [ ] New users getting started
- [ ] Advanced users
- [ ] Contributors
- [ ] API users
- [ ] All users

### Additional Context

**Screenshots or examples**

Add any screenshots, examples, or additional context here.

**Are there related docs that might need updates?**

- Document 1

## ‚úîÔ∏è Checklist

- [ ] I have checked if this is already documented elsewhere
- [ ] I have provided specific location information
- [ ] I have suggested an improvement
- [ ] I would like to submit a PR to fix this

### Contribution

- [ ] I would like to fix this documentation myself
- [ ] I can review a PR that fixes this
- [ ] I just want to report the issue
